p: The chemical composition of HSEO was revealed by GC–MS analysis using PerkinElmer Clarus 600 C (PerkinElmer, Inc., Waltham, USA) equipped with DB-5MS column (30 m × 0.25 mm; 0.25 μm film thickness) as per our previous reported methodology (Kalagatur et al., 2015). The chemical constituents of HSEO were identified by comparing their mass spectra (MS) with NIST/Wiley library and retention indices (RI) literature of Adams ( 2007). The quantification (%) of chemical constituents was obtained from the GC peak areas devoid of correction factors.
